title: Piccure+ 2.0.0.271 – Correct optical aberrations like never before
content: piccure+ is a new software program capable of correcting optical aberrations that cause a lack of sharpness in your images.   piccure+ uses a new method that essentially inverts the optical processes that cause images to look blurry. title: Deja Vu 4.8.4 – Effortless backup and cloning utility
content: Deja Vu offers an intuitive and reliable way to back up your data. It’s a preference pane that shows up in your System Preferences, and it allows you to schedule unattended backups of important folders, or even your entire system.   With Deja Vu, you can: Backup an unlimited number of folders. title: Tab Launcher 2.8 – Clean up and organize the Dock
content: The idea of Tab Launcher is not to replace the system’s dock, but to help keep it clean, with only the applications that are currently running.   By removing all the application from the dock and organizing them on tabs, you can quickly find and run any application you want.   Apart from that, you […]

title: Thumbs 1.0.3 – Generate images from your media collection
content: Meet Thumbs, your new personal assistant for movie stills and thumbsheets. title: ReceiptBox 2.3.1 – Keep track of your receipts

title: Printopia 2.1.10.2 – Share Mac printers with iOS devices
content: Run Printopia on your Mac to share its printers to any capable iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch. title: iVideo 7.0.1 – Powerful app for organizing and sharing movies
content: iVideo is the best way to find, play, and share your videos.   Organize videos across multiple hard drives and websites, all from one place.
